channel.title: Need help creating jar file
channel.description:
Okay, I need to create a jar file.
Now, this is the line I'm expose to be using to direct it to my class files I want to be converted into a .jar. [code] jar cf jar-file input-file(s) [/code]
Okay, my class files are in this directory: C:\jar
^^ it's a folder containing my files. So how would i turn that folders files in a .jar file using that command I mentioned above.

item.title: Need help creating jar file
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Okay, I need to create a jar file.

Now, this is the line I’m expose to be using to direct it to my class files I want to be converted into a .jar.

jar cf jar-file input-file(s)

Okay, my class files are in this directory:
C:\jar

^^ it’s a folder containing my files.
So how would i turn that folders files in a .jar file using that command I mentioned above.
